# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## [1.0.0] - 2025-09-24
- Promote the Rust-backed base-57 helpers and Python bindings to a stable 1.0.0 release.
- Preallocate encoding buffers and identifier strings to avoid unnecessary heap churn.
- Add automated publishing to PyPI and GitHub releases once changes land on ``main``.
